include_virtual_price.label: Include Virtual Products in Price Calculation

general.comment: Here you can enable or disable the entire extension. This is also where you register your extension for use.
general.label: General Settings

activation_in_progress_header.label: The extension has been partially activated. Fill in the fields below and press the 'finish activation' button below to finish the procedure. Click here to reset the activation procedure.

activated_header.label: The extension has been activated. Click here to be able to activate the extension under a different name.

email.label: Email
email.comment: During activation 2 secure keys will be sent to this email address.

cif.comment: Here you can configure your PostNL account.
cif.label: Account Settings

customer_code.label: Customer Code
customer_code.comment: Your customer code as supplied by PostNL. Must contain between 3 and 4 leters.

collection_location.label: BLS Code
collection_location.comment: The internal code of the nearest PostNL Sorting centre. Must contain 6 numbers.

global_fields_header.label: These fields are only required if you intend to send products to countries outside the EU.

global_barcode_type.label: Global Barcode Type
global_barcode_type.comment: The current global barcode type as supplied by PostNL. Must contain 2 leters.

global_barcode_range.label: Global Barcode Range
global_barcode_range.comment: Your global barcode range as supplied by PostNL. Must contain 4 digits.

checkout_ids_header.label: These fields contain your webshop IDs. These are required for PostNL Checkout to function.

contact_date_header.label: These fields contain your contact information for PostNL.

cif_labels_and_confirming.comment: Here you can specify your confirming and label printing preferences. You can also customize the way our modified shipment and order grids are displayed. Lastly, you can specify whether the extension should austomatically send a track & trace email to your customers.
cif_labels_and_confirming.label: Confirming & Label Printing Settings

label_size.label: Label size
label_size.comment: This setting only applies to multiple Dutch and EPS labels. GlobalPack labels are always printed as A4. Single Dutch or EPS labels are always printed in A6.

weight_per_parcel.label: Maximum weight per parcel
weight_per_parcel.comment: Determine the maximum weight of each parcel. if a shipment's total weight exceeds this, another parcel is added to the shipment.

weight_unit.label: Weight unit
weight_unit.comment: Select the unit in which you've entered products' weight

shipment_reference_type.label: Shipment reference type
shipment_reference_type.comment: Select what to use as a shipment's reference. This will be printed on the shipping label

custom_shipment_reference.label: Custom reference value
custom_shipment_reference.comment: You can use the following variables: {{var shipment_increment_id}}, {{var order_increment_id}} and {{var store_frontend_name}}. The resulting text may not exceed 28 characters.

grid_header.label: These fields allow you to alter the way the order and shipment grids are displayed.

show_grid_options.label: Show product options in order grid
show_grid_options.comment: This will add a product options field to the create shipments mass action in the order grid. If disabled, default options will be used. N.B. Not applicable to global shipments.

show_shipment_type_column.label: Show shipment type column in order grid
show_shipment_type_column.comment: This will add a column to the order grid allowing you to identify whether the order is domestic, EU or global.

shipping_grid_columns.label: Optional Shipment grid columns
shipping_grid_columns.comment: Select which optional columns to show in the shipment grid.

shipping_grid_massaction_default.label: Select a default option for the shipment grid mass action

email_header.label: These fields are used to configure the track & trace email that may be automatically emailed to customers after a shipment has been confirmed.

send_track_and_trace_email.label: Send track & trace e-mail to customer
send_track_and_trace_email.comment: If enabled, a track & trace e-mail will be sent to the customer ~20 minutes after a shipment has been confirmed.

cif_address.comment: This is where you configure the way the extension handles addresses entered by your customers. This is very important if you want to make printing correctly formatted shipping labels foolproof.
cif_address.label: Address Settings

optional_street_fields_header.label: The following fields are optional and should remain empty, unless you specifically use these fields in your checkout configuration.

cif_sender_address.comment: This is where you enter your address. This is required for the extension to work.
cif_sender_address.label: Sender Address

cif_return_address.comment: You may specify a separate return address for shipments that could not be delivered. If you do not wish to specify a separate return address, your sender address will be used.
cif_return_address.label: Return Address

use_sender_address.label: Use the sender address as the return adress

cif_product_options.comment: Here you can specify the PostNL product options that will be used by the extension. You can always override the 'default option' settings by manually creating shipments.
cif_product_options.label: Product Options

supported_product_options.label: Select supported option
supported_product_options.comment: Only the selected options will be available.

default_product_option.label: Default shipping options
default_product_option.comment: These can be overwritten by manually creating shipments. These options are only applicable to Dutch shipments.

use_alternative_default.label: Use an alternative default option
use_alternative_default.comment: Enable this to use an alternative default option when a shipment's total value exceeds a certain amount.

alternative_default_max_amount.label: Maximum amount
alternative_default_max_amount.comment: The alternative default option will be used when the shipment's total amount exceeds this value.

alternative_default_option.label: Alternative default shipping option
alternative_default_option.comment: This option will be used as default when the shipment's total value exceeds the given amount.

default_pakjegemak_product_option.label: Default PakjeGemak option
default_pakjegemak_product_option.comment: These can be overwritten by manually creating shipments. These options are only applicable to PakjeGemak shipments.

checkout.comment: Here you can enable or disable PostNL Checkout as well as completely customize all of it's facets.
checkout.label: PostNL Checkout Settings

checkout_button_header.label: Here you can customize when and how the PostNL Checkout button is displayed.

show_checkout_for_letter.label: Enable PostNL Checkout for orders under 2 kg

show_checkout_for_backorders.label: Enable PostNL Checkout for orders containing out of stock products

checkout_customization_header.label: Here you can customaize the way PostNL Checkout behaves in your webshop.

show_summary_page.label: Show order summary page
show_summary_page.comment: Whether or not to show the customer a final order summary page before finalizing the order.

newsletter_subscription.label: Newsletter subscription
newsletter_subscription.comment: Whether or not PostNL Checkout will offer the customer the ability to subscribe to your newsletter.

remark.label: Remark
remark.comment: Whether or not the customer can leave a remark.

use_mobile.label: Use mobile phonenumber
use_mobile.comment: Whether or not the customer's mobile phonenumber will be returned by PostNL if available.

use_dob.label: Use date of birth
use_dob.comment: Whether or not the customer's date of birth will be returned by PostNL if available.

allow_retail_location.label: Allow postoffice locations (PakjeGemak)
allow_retail_location.comment: Whether or not the customer may choose a retail location as their delivery address.

allow_foreign_address.label: Allow foreign addresses
allow_foreign_address.comment: Whether or not the customer may choose a foreign address as their shipping address.

allow_price_overview.label: Allow price overview
allow_price_overview.comment: Whether or not the user will see a price overview in PostNL Checkout

agree_conditions.label: Agree conditions
agree_conditions.comment: Whether or not the customer must agree to the terms and conditions before being allowed to proceed.

checkout_urls_header.label: These URLs allow the customer to contact you. They will be shown on the user's MijnPakket page.

contact_url.label: Contact URL
contact_url.comment: URL of a page where customers can find contact information for your webshop. Leave empty to disable this feature.

service_url.label: Service URL
service_url.comment: URL of a page where customers can find information regarding the webshop's customer service department.

checkout_payment_methods.comment: This is where you specify which payment options will be presented to your customers in PostNL Checkout. At least one of these must be activated for PostNL Checkout to work.
checkout_payment_methods.label: PostNL Checkout Payment Settings

postnl_checkout_disabled_header.label: PostNL Checkout is disabled. please enable PostNL Checkout in order to configure these settings.

ideal_option_field.label: iDeal Bank Field
ideal_option_field.comment: Enter the field name used by the selected payment method for the 'bank' field.

creditcard_option_field.label: Creditcard card type field
creditcard_option_field.comment: Enter the field name used by the selected payment method for the 'creditcard type' field.

advanced.comment: These settings are intended for advanced users only! If you're not 100% sure what you're doing, please do not touch these settings.
advanced.label: Advanced Settings

debug_mode.label: Debug mode
debug_mode.comment: If enabled, debug logs will be created in the var/logs folder.
debug_mode.tooltip: Full logging will log various debugging messages as well as errors.

infinite_label_printing.label: Allow infinite label printing
infinite_label_printing.comment: By default a maximum of 200 labels can be printed at once. Enable this to remove this limitation. Beware: enabling this may lead to server instability.

max_parcel_count.label: Maximum number of parcels per shipment
max_parcel_count.comment:
Leave empty to allow an infinite amount of parcels per shipment.
If this value is empty or exceeds 200, you need to set 'Allow infinite label printing' to yes in order to be able to print the shipment's labels.

max_temp_file_storage_time.label: Maximum temporary file storage time
max_temp_file_storage_time.comment: In seconds. After this time, temporary files will be deleted. Only increase this if you use custom functionality to create a very large amount of labels at once.

confirm_expire_days.label: Number of days before a confirmation expires
confirm_expire_days.comment: If a confirmed shipment has not been shipped after this amount of days it's confirmation will expire.

send_statistics.label: Send extension usage statistics to PostNL

recieve_updates.label: Recieve notifications from PostNL regarding updates and promotions

cif_versions_header.label: The following fields determine the CIF version used by each service. Tampering with these settings may result in unexpected behaviour or it may disable the module altogether.
